ITEMS.name: Time
ITEMS.long: The abstract concept of time. You only have so much in a day. Doing stuff or going places costs time. Returning home never costs time. Sleep to regain time

ITEMS.name: Money
ITEMS.long: Makes the world go 'round. Can be used to trade for goods or services. Comes in paper form as a small rectangle or electronically as a number on your phone.
